title: Restore admin panel with passcode-protected product management interface

requirements.text: Restore the admin panel interface that displays both the passcode-protected ItemForm component for adding products and the ItemList component for viewing/managing existing products

quotes: Make sure to add the old block, like the one that says where you can add the products and the passcode. Like the admin.

acceptanceCriteria: The admin interface displays the passcode entry field requiring '3415' before showing the add product form
After entering the correct passcode, the ItemForm component becomes visible with fields for name, description, price, and image upload
The ItemList component displays all existing products with delete buttons
The admin panel layout matches the previous implementation structure

requirements.text: Ensure the admin panel remains accessible within the application's routing structure

quotes: Make sure to add the old block, like the one that says where you can add the products and the passcode. Like the admin.

acceptanceCriteria: The admin route exists and is navigable
Users can access the admin panel to manage products
The admin functionality works independently from the main checkout flow

constraints: Maintain the existing passcode '3415' for admin access
Preserve the existing ItemForm and ItemList component functionality
Keep the backend deleteItem and addItem methods unchanged
nonGoals: Adding new admin features beyond restoring existing functionality
